ServiceRepository

ServiceRepository

This module handles service dependant tasks such as managing list of other services and their functions, keeping track of other nodes, performing ping etc.

Note that any code and function regarding the calls should be inside undelying transportClient and transportServer

Constructor

new ServiceRepository(xyz)

Source:
  • src/Service/service.repository.js, line 23

Creates a new ServiceRepository Transport client and server will be composed by ServiceRepository

Parameters:
Name Type Description
xyz Object

the current xyz instance

Methods

bindTransportEvent()

Source:
  • src/Service/service.repository.js, line 119

bind default events for a given server. Should not be called directly. The use can use this y setting the third parameter to registerServer, e to true. This will case this method to be called.

this method will cause services to be searched an invoked via CONSTANTS.events.MESSAGE event, which is equal to message. This event will be emitter by default from http.receive.event.js middleware.

inspect()

Source:
  • src/Service/service.repository.js, line 87

override the default console.log function

inspectJSON()

Source:
  • src/Service/service.repository.js, line 102

same as inspect() in JSON format

register(path, fn)

Source:
  • src/Service/service.repository.js, line 80

Register a new service at a given path.

The first parameter path will indicate the path of the service. Note that this path must be valid.

xyz.register() will invoke this method

Parameters:
Name Type Description
path String

path of the service
fn function

function to be registered
